name: PooZoo
description:
A particularly ambitious lion has united a band of dogs and lions, after which they escaped their zoo together. Naturally, their next step is to find a nice place to defecate. That place just so happens to be your garden. This is some bad timing for you, because you've just started growing weed for the cartel. If those animals ruin your weed, the cartel will come for you. To prevent that from happening, you need to drive the animals away from your plants, using a watergun. 

Features:

- Save and autosave

- 5 days / rounds

- Bossfight on day 5

- Upgrades

- Configurable controls, volume, sensitivity and additional settings

- 3 Difficulties. The hardest difficulty will probably require some practice

- Cutscenes

- 3 Self made songs

- Voice acting
